attributes.action: Support Andrea Leadsom as the next Prime Minister after Brexit
attributes.additional_details:
Andrea Leadsom worked in the financial sector for BZW and Barclays Bank.
She was a founder and leader of the "Fresh Start Project" reform the UK relationship with EU.
http://www.andrealeadsom.com/home/biography
attributes.background: Conservative Member of Parliament for South Northamptonshire. She has served as Minister of State for Energy at the Department of Energy and Climate Change since 11 May 2015, having previously held the post of Economic Secretary to the Treasury from April 2014. She was pro Brexit campaign .

rejection.details:
In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.

After a general election, the Queen decides who to invite to form a Government. In practice, this is usually the leader of the political party that wins the most seats in a general election. You can find out more about this here:

http://www.royal.gov.uk/MonarchUK/QueenandGovernment/QueenandPrimeMinister.aspx
